TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit EventLogEntry extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class EventLogEntry Inherits Component Implements ISerializable
public ref class EventLogEntry sealed : System::ComponentModel::Component, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type EventLogEntry = class inherit Component interface ISerializable

summary.span: 在事件日志中封装单个记录。

span.span: Encapsulates a single record in the event log.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不会创建的实例直接使用时类。You usually will not create instances of directly when working with the class. 的成员类包含一系列实例，通过使用读取时循环访问类索引成员。The member of the class contains a collection of instances, which you iterate over when reading by using the class index member. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 在此示例中，`switch`语句使用控制台输入要搜索指定的事件类型的事件日志项。In this example, a `switch` statement uses console input to search for event log entries for the specified event type. 如果找到匹配项，则将在控制台中显示日志项的源信息。If a match is found, log entry source information is displayed at the console. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CPP/eventlogentry_source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CS/eventlogentry_source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/VB/eventlogentry_source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Category As String
public: property System::String ^ Category { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与该项的 属性关联的文本。

span.span: Gets the text associated with the property for this entry.

value.span: 应用程序特定的类别文本。

span.span: The application-specific category text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个应用程序 （事件源） 可以定义自己的编号的类别和映射到的文本字符串。Each application (event source) can define its own numbered categories and the text strings to which they are mapped. 事件查看器可以在日志中使用的类别筛选事件。The Event Viewer can use the category to filter events in the log.

exception.span: 未能为与类别关联的插入字符串之一分配空间。

span.span: The space could not be allocated for one of the insertion strings associated with the category.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CategoryNumber As Short
public: property short CategoryNumber { short get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("An ID for the category of this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取事件日志项的类别号。

span.span: Gets the category number of the event log entry.

value.span: 该项的应用程序特定类别号。

span.span: The application-specific category number for this entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个应用程序 （事件源） 可以定义自己的编号的类别和映射到的文本字符串。Each application (event source) can define its own numbered categories and the text strings to which they are mapped. 事件查看器可以在日志中使用的类别筛选事件。The Event Viewer can use the category to filter events in the log. 类别必须是连续编号开头以数字 1。The categories must be numbered consecutively beginning with the number 1. 指定的类别号属性。The category number is specified by the property. 事件查看器可以将类别显示为数字值，或者它可以作为资源标识符使用类别来显示本地化的类别字符串。The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Data As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Data { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("Binary data associated with this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取与该项关联的二进制数据。

span.span: Gets the binary data associated with the entry.

value.span: 包含与此项关联的二进制数据的字节数组。

span.span: An array of bytes that holds the binary data associated with the entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性创建一个数组，其中包含项的特定于事件的二进制数据，其中显示中组合的十六进制转义序列和文本格式的事件查看器的副本。Getting this property creates an array that holds a copy of the entry's event-specific binary data, which the Event Viewer displays in combined hexadecimal and text format. 若要存储应用程序将独立于事件查看器中，例如处理的信息，以使报表从日志文件，有时会使用特定于事件的数据。Event-specific data is sometimes used to store information that the application will process independently of the Event Viewer, for example, to make reports from the log file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EntryType As EventLogEntryType
public: property System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType EntryType { System::Diagnostics::EventLogEntryType get(); };

span.span: Gets the event type of this entry.

value.span: 与事件日志中的项相关联的事件类型。

span.span: The event type that is associated with the entry in the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有事件类型具有定义完善的常用数据，并可以选择性地包含特定于事件的数据。All event types have well-defined common data and can optionally include event-specific data. 每个事件是一种类型，该应用程序指示它报告事件时。Each event is of a single type, which the application indicates when it reports the event. 事件查看器使用的事件类型来确定要在事件日志的列表视图中显示的图标。The Event Viewer uses the event type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the event log. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 在此示例中，`switch`语句使用控制台输入要搜索的指定事件日志项。In this example, a `switch` statement uses console input to search for event log entries for the specified . 如果找到匹配项，则将在控制台中显示日志项的源信息。If a match is found, log entry source information is displayed at the console. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CPP/eventlogentry_source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CS/eventlogentry_source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/VB/eventlogentry_source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Equals(class System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry otherEntry) cil managed
Public Function Equals (otherEntry As EventLogEntry) As Boolean

span.span: The to compare.

summary.span: 对两个事件日志项进行比较。

span.span: Performs a comparison between two event log entries.

returns.span: 如果 对象完全相同，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the objects are identical; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行两个对象之间的逐字节比较。This method performs a byte-by-byte comparison between the two objects. 不能确定是否两个实例引用同一对象。It does not determine whether the two instances refer to the same object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EventID As Integer
public: property int EventID { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("An ID number for this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取当前事件项的应用程序特定事件标识符。

span.span: Gets the application-specific event identifier for the current event entry.

value.span: 事件消息的应用程序特定标识符。

span.span: The application-specific identifier for the event message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值表示条目的事件标识符的事件日志，并且最顶部的两位掩码中。This value represents the event identifier for the entry in the event log, with the top two bits masked off. 的事件日志条目的属性表示事件源的消息资源文件中的事件的全 32 位资源标识符。The property for an event log entry represents the full 32-bit resource identifier for the event in the message resource file for the event source. 从同一源的两个事件日志条目可以有匹配值，但具有不同由于的事件标识符的最高两位不同的值。Two event log entries from the same source can have matching values, but have different values due to differences in the top two bits of the event identifier. 如果应用程序编写了使用其中一个事件条目方法，属性匹配可选`eventId`参数。If the application wrote the event entry using one of the methods, the property matches the optional `eventId` parameter. 如果应用程序编写了使用事件或 Win32 API `ReportEvent`，则属性与该事件的资源标识符匹配并且高应用掩码的两位。If the application wrote the event using or the Win32 API `ReportEvent`, the property matches the resource identifier for the event, with the top two bits masked off.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Index As Integer
public: property int Index { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取该项在事件日志中的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of this entry in the event log.

value.span: 该项在事件日志中的索引。

span.span: The index of this entry in the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此数字并不一定是从零开始。This number is not necessarily zero-based.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InstanceId As Long
public: property long InstanceId { long get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The instance ID for this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取指定事件项的消息文本的资源标识符。

span.span: Gets the resource identifier that designates the message text of the event entry.

value.span: 资源标识符，与事件源的消息资源文件中的字符串定义对应。

span.span: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string definition in the message resource file of the event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性唯一地标识配置的事件源的事件条目。The property uniquely identifies an event entry for a configured event source. 与事件日志条目表示事件源的消息资源文件中的事件的全 32 位资源标识符。The for an event log entry represents the full 32-bit resource identifier for the event in the message resource file for the event source. 属性等于应用掩码的前两位。The property equals the with the top two bits masked off. 从同一源的两个事件日志条目可以有匹配值，但具有不同由于中的资源标识符的最高两位不同的值。Two event log entries from the same source can have matching values, but have different values due to differences in the top two bits of the resource identifier. 如果应用程序编写了使用其中一个事件条目方法，属性匹配可选`eventId`参数。If the application wrote the event entry using one of the methods, the property matches the optional `eventId` parameter. 如果应用程序编写了使用事件，则属性中指定的资源标识符匹配的`instance`参数。If the application wrote the event using , the property matches the resource identifier specified in the of the `instance` parameter. 如果应用程序编写了使用 Win32 API 的事件`ReportEvent`，则属性中指定的资源标识符匹配`dwEventID`参数。If the application wrote the event using the Win32 API `ReportEvent`, the property matches the resource identifier specified in the `dwEventID` parameter. 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件日志资源文件的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[ http://msdn.microsoft.com ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。For details about defining event messages and building event log resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/). 有关事件日志的标识符的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 中的"事件标识符"主题。For details about event log identifiers, see the "Event Identifiers" topic in the Platform SDK. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将搜索事件日志的条目的特定资源标识符。The following code example searches an event log for entries with a particular resource identifier. 代码示例显示每个匹配项的事件消息，并计算在日志中的匹配项的总数。The code example displays the event message for each matching entry, and counts the total number of matching entries in the log. 每个条目的消息文本可能会或可能不能相同;每条事件消息取决于事件源消息文件、 插入字符串和时写入数组时使用的参数。The message text for each entry may or may not be the same; each event message depends on the event source message file, insertion strings, and parameters used when it was written. [!code-cpp[EventLog_WriteEvent#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CPP/source.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[EventLog_WriteEvent#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/CS/source.cs#10)] [!code-vb[EventLog_WriteEvent#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/eventlog_WriteEvent/VB/source.vb#10)]

public: property System::String ^ MachineName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The Computer on which this event entry occured.")

summary.span: 获取在其上生成该项的计算机的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the computer on which this entry was generated.

value.span: 包含事件日志的计算机的名称。

span.span: The name of the computer that contains the event log.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.ComponentModel.Design.BinaryEditor, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取与该事件项关联的本地化消息。

span.span: Gets the localized message associated with this event entry.

value.span: 消息的格式化、本地化文本。

span.span: The formatted, localized text for the message.

value.span: 其中包含关联的替换字符串。

span.span: This includes associated replacement strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取此属性将打开注册表，以确定包含本地化的文本的.dll 文件的文件名。Getting this property opens the registry to determine the file name of the .dll file that contains the localized text. 如果测试你的源代码时，收到注册表错误，请验证计算机上存在的.dll 文件。If you receive a registry error when testing your source code, verify that the .dll file exists on the computer. 如果消息中包含插入字符串，捕获其分配中的错误。If insertion strings are included in the message, catch errors in their allocation.

exception.span: 未能为与消息关联的插入字符串之一分配空间。

span.span: The space could not be allocated for one of the insertion strings associated with the message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReplacementStrings As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ ReplacementStrings { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与事件日志项关联的替换字符串。

span.span: Gets the replacement strings associated with the event log entry.

value.span: 包含存储在事件项中的替换字符串的数组。

span.span: An array that holds the replacement strings stored in the event entry.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Source As String
public: property System::String ^ Source { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The source application of this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取生成该事件的应用程序的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the application that generated this event.

value.span: 在事件日志中注册为该事件的源的名称。

span.span: The name registered with the event log as the source of this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件源指示什么记录该事件。The event source indicates what logged the event. 它通常是应用程序的名称或应用程序的子组件的名称时应用程序非常大。It is often the name of the application or the name of a subcomponent of the application if the application is large. 应用程序和服务通常写入到 （并因此是源） 应用程序日志或自定义日志。Applications and services usually write to (and therefore are sources for) the Application log or a custom log. 设备驱动程序通常写入到系统日志中。Device drivers usually write to the System log. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 在此示例中，`switch`语句使用控制台输入要搜索的指定事件日志项。In this example, a `switch` statement uses console input to search for event log entries for the specified . 如果找到匹配项，则属性信息显示在控制台中。If a match is found, the property information is displayed at the console. [!code-cpp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CPP/eventlogentry_source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/CS/eventlogentry_source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[EventLogEntry_Source#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/EventLogEntry_Source/VB/eventlogentry_source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeGenerated As DateTime
public: property DateTime TimeGenerated { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 获取生成该事件的本地时间。

span.span: Gets the local time at which this event was generated.

value.span: 生成该事件的本地时间。

span.span: The local time at which this event was generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员保留已生成的事件的时间。This member holds the time that an event was generated. 这可能不是事件日志中的事件信息写入时的时间相同。This might not be the same as the time when the event information was written to the event log. 对于后者，读取属性。For the latter, read the property. 通常是生成一个事件的时间与它记录的时间之间的延迟。There is usually a lag between the time that an event is generated and the time it is logged. 很多必须知道生成事件的除非你想要查看日志记录中是否存在明显延迟的情况。It is more important to know when the event was generated, unless you want to see if there is a significant lag in logging. 如果你的日志文件在不同的服务器上，并且遇到瓶颈，则可能发生的问题。That can happen if your log files are on a different server and you are experiencing a bottleneck.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeWritten As DateTime
public: property DateTime TimeWritten { DateTime get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The time at which this event entry was written to the logfile.")

summary.span: 获取在日志中写入该事件的本地时间。

span.span: Gets the local time at which this event was written to the log.

value.span: 在日志中写入该事件的本地时间。

span.span: The local time at which this event was written to the log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员保留某一事件的信息写入事件日志的时间。This member holds the time that an event's information is written to the event log. 这可能不是相同的生成事件的时间。This might not be the same time as when the event was generated. 对于后者，读取属性。For the latter, read the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserName As String
public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Diagnostics.MonitoringDescription("The name of a user associated with this event entry.")

summary.span: 获取负责该事件的用户的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the user who is responsible for this event.

value.span: 唯一标识用户或组的安全标识符 (SID)。

span.span: The security identifier (SID) that uniquely identifies a user or group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常是空白的日志而不是安全日志中的事件。This property is often blank for events in logs other than the Security log.

exception.span: 未能为用户的 SID 获取帐户信息。

span.span: Account information could not be obtained for the user's SID.
